steps.description: Make the brine: In a saucepan, combine the water, rice vinegar, distilled white vinegar, sugar, and kosher salt. Bring to a simmer and cook, stirring, until the sugar and salt dissolve (about 12–15 minutes). Let the brine cool to room temperature.
Prepare the jars and lids by washing them in hot, soapy water and letting them dry.

Assemble the jars: Into each of 6 half-pint jars, put 2 garlic cloves, 1/2 teaspoon black peppercorns, 1/2 teaspoon mustard seeds, 1/2 teaspoon coriander seeds, and 3 dill sprigs. Pack the trimmed green beans into the jars, standing them upright.
Pour the brine into the jars to cover the beans. Wipe rims and seal with lids and rings until snug.
Refrigerate the jars for at least 1 week before serving; they keep for up to 1 month.
